evidence.text: We GRANT the government’s motion for a stay of the district court’s injunction pending appeal.

extracted.value: stay of the district court’s injunction pending appeal

evidence.text: enforcement of the Executive Order against plaintiffs is enjoined to preserve the status quo until trial.

extracted.value: enforcement of the Executive Order against plaintiffs is enjoined to preserve the status quo until trial

evidence.text: An expedited trial date will be set in a separate order.

extracted.value: An expedited trial date will be set in a separate order
